@R3PTIL32 You're just assuming everybody that dislikes NTR is American. People don't like NTR because whenever it's incorporated into stories (mostly in hentai/doujin) it is done so lazily. Authors will display very minimum effort in actually making it GOOD or even interesting and the implementation of it is almost always done in the same stupid and uninspired ways every time. If a doujin ends up being NTR, chances are high that you very likely know exactly how it'll end up.
This is not a recent work, guys, it's from COMIC HOTMILK 2015-12 but this version has less of a censorship (black bars vs full white). Compare to #160943 or #163814
